about.title: About Yellamma Thalli Devasthanam
about.description: Dedicated to preserving tradition, fostering spirituality, and serving the community since 1995.
about.historyText: Founded over two decades ago by a group of dedicated families, Yellamma Thalli Devasthanam started as a small gathering in a community hall. Through unwavering faith and the generous support of our devotees, we have grown into a vibrant spiritual center.
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide a sanctuary for worship, to educate our youth about our rich cultural heritage, and to serve the broader community through charitable activities. We believe in the universal values of peace, love, and compassion.
about.yellammaDesc: The presiding deity, embodying protection, strength, and maternal love. Goddess Yellamma is revered as the protector of women and children, and the guardian of dharma.
about.dailyWorshipDesc: Morning and evening puja ceremonies conducted with traditional rituals and devotion.
about.festivalsDesc: Grand celebrations of Hindu festivals with special ceremonies, cultural programs, and community gatherings.
about.educationDesc: Classes on Hindu philosophy, Sanskrit, devotional music, and traditional arts for youth and adults.
about.communityServiceDesc: Charitable activities, food distribution, medical camps, and support for the underprivileged.
